abstract: Verizon Communications sold $49 billion worth of bonds in the largest investment grade corporate bond sale ever, trumping the previous record set by Apple’s $17 billion bond sale in April.

lead_paragraph: Updated, 9:05 p.m. | For companies looking to raise money through the debt markets, and the bankers egging them on, it seems no sum is too large.

headline.main: Companies Embrace Low Interest Rates by Selling Bonds to Raise Billions
